jobDescription: Job openings Sales Representative Sales Representative  Job descriptionAre you . . .Passionate about a successful sales career and creating financial freedom?Do you . . .Have the energy, drive and motivation to achieve your goals?Can you . . .Stay the course and execute through any roadblock or obstacle?If this sounds like you…Come join our team! The Sales Representative is a full-time outside sales professional responsible for developing and growing profitable revenue by selling a portfolio of office technology, which includes solutions, services and products, to medium and large size businesses.  After completing our extensive training program, you will be empowered to: Build relationships with new customers at all levels, up to C-suite, as well as identifying, selling and supporting value-add solutions and services in existing accountsConvey the value of our brand to influence decision makers and win over the competitionUnderstand customer buying cycles and sales processesManage your time and resources for efficient territory planning, to successfully manage the entire sales cycleRequirementsTo be successful in this role, you will: Have exceptional verbal and written communicationDemonstrate professional presentation skillsBe collaborative and work effectively in a team environmentHave 1-2 years B2B sales experience
